original_text: I am afraid that I may be very sad when I come back to you. My God may cause me to feel ashamed about you. Some of you may still be doing bad and disgusting things. You may be having sex with people that you are not married to, or in other wrong ways. Those are the bad things that many of you did at one time. If you have not turned away from those bad things, that will make me weep.
korean_text: 또 내가 다시 갈 때에 내 하나님이 나를 너희 앞에서 낮추실까 두려워하고 또 내가 전에 죄를 지은 여러 사람의 그 행한 바 더러움과 음란함과 호색함을 회개하지 아니함 때문에 슬퍼할까 두려워하노라

sentences.original_text: that I may be very sad
when I come back to you
My God may cause me to feel ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 하나님이 나를 부끄럽게 하실지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: Some of you may still be doing bad and disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 일부는 여전히 나쁘고 역겨운 일들을 하고 있을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: You may be having sex with people that you are not married to
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 결혼하지 않은 사람들과 성관계를 하고 있을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: that many of you did at one time
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 많은 사람들이 한 때 했던

sentences.original_text: If you have not turned away from those bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 그 나쁜 일들에서 돌아서지 않았다면
